newsitem.title: ESTONIA: BALTICS-BALTIC 30 INDEX UP 0.99 PCT TO 126.57.
newsitem.headline: BALTICS-BALTIC 30 INDEX UP 0.99 PCT TO 126.57.

text.p: The Baltic 30 index, the only pan-Baltic index, which is compiled by the three leading business newspapers, rose by 0.99 percent to 126.57 on Tuesday, Estonia's Aripaev said.
The Baltic 30 index covers the 10 leading stocks from the three Baltic stock markets and is compiled by Aripaev, Lithuania's Verslo Zinios and Latvia's Dienas Bizness.
The index started from 100 on May 19.
